fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Shielding: Give another Beast Basic Defense for the night. If they are attacked, you will counterattack with a Basic Attack. This may self-target. **Locked**: Defend a second Beast.
-Laser Cannon: Hit your target with a Basic Attack. If they survive, you will lower their defense by one level for the next night, to a minimum of Vulnerable. **Locked**: If you successfully kill, you will permanently upgrade your attack to Powerful.
-Repetition (**Locked**, 3-shot): Use an ability that was used on you the previous night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will be shown as **Blasted by Unit**
-You are aware of what abilities you are targeted by each night and what roles they came from.
-**Locked**: If only two Beasts remain, the other Beast will gain permanent Basic Defense.
-**Unlock Condition**: If the Town was the largest ‘Good’ faction at the start of the game, Unlock.
